title: What is TwinZ?
description: TwinZ is all about special bonds and community.  Everything with TwinZ is double that will make more sense as details about the project are released.  The story of the origination of TwinZ will be released as a Manga through community participation.  The “Z” holds strong meaning in the TwinZ community.

title: How Can I Join You?
description: We have over 30k discord members competing for a chance to be Whitelisted. We still have some whitelist spots left but they are filling up quickly. Be sure to join our discord server by using the following link

title: How many Twinz are taking over the world?
Will Twinz have Utility?
description: Hell yes they will! Head over to the road map section over website to see what we have in store.

title: What Blockchain is the Project Hosted On?
When can I see my NFT?
description: Your NFT will be revealed several days after we have minted out. Stay tuned in our discord for further information.
